"Pikachu, let's go!". Ash said as he pointed at Dawn's Piplup. They were having a "friendly battle", but as it went on, the competition became more intense.

"Piplup, use bubblebeam!" Dawn countered. Piplup shot it straight at Pikachu, but he suddenly jumped at the last moment, using a single Thunder on Piplup to knock it out.

"Piplup is unable to battle. Pikachu and Ash are the Winners!" Brock cheered. Dawn looked cross. "You had to do that to me, did you?" she asked Ash."You know what? I'm gonna go to the last Pokemon center to heal and stock up on supplies."

"OOOh OOOh Ooh, I'll come too!!!" Brock shouted, thinking of Nurse Joy. "All right then, I guess I'll stay here," said Ash.

Ash walked farther, and suddenly stumbled over something. He bent down and picked it up. It was a strange silver machine with five buttons.

1112.content:
Several days had passed since Ash's victory against Pike Queen Lucy and things have been peaceful. He and his friends May, Max and Brock decided to take a bath in a hot spring before continuing their trek through the Kanto Region.

Ash jumped into the air and splashed into the water, which hits May in the face. "Hey! Would you watch that!"

"Sorry" said Ash with his head comming out of the water.

May huffed and laid her head against a nearby rock. She started starring at Ash without him knowing it. She had a crush on him ever since they first met in Littleroot Town but has never told him how she felt about him.

It's times like this I wished I could actual become like Ash she thought with a sigh.

Ash in the meanwhile had his eyes closed and wondered about how everything had led to this. He really liked the idea of May being in her pink bikini and he also had this strange feeling.

I wonder how things would be if I was May.

Without saying anything, both Ash and May closed their eyes and started to relax in the hot spring.

11131212.content:
Ash ran a hand through his dark hair, and picked up his water bottle. Tired, he drank almost the whole canteen, and Pikachu drank what was left.
"Pikapi, Pika Pikachu!" Pikachu exclaimed upon discovering that there was no more.
"Brock, do you know where we are?" May asked.
"Uh... yes...no...maybe..." Brock sweatdropped.
"We're in the middle of nowhere, stranded in a desert!" cried Ash, who ran around in circles saying, "Water, water, water..."
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------------------

In the tent that night, Ash reached for his water bottle, and, upon discovering it was empty, stalked outside and threw his water bottle around.
"I'm gonna die of dehydration because my sucky partners are lost! I wish I was in a place full of water. Better yet, I wish I wasn't stuck with these guys. And even better, I wish both of these wishes would come true!"
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---------------------------------
Unbeknownst to Ash, Mew, who happened to be flying overhead at that time, decided to help him.
"I'll show Mewtwo I'm a compassionate Pokemon who CAN help others!"
She/He/It called on its psychic powers, its eyes glowing pink.

Below, Ash's eyes closed, and he drifted off to a peaceful sleep.
11131212.title: I'm Ash, no, Misty!?

choices: He calls his friends/looks for the real Misty
111312122.content:
Ash groaned as he stirred, rubbing his eyes. Thinking he felt more comfortable than he ever had on his journey, he remembered his thirst. He rolled out from under the covers, only to drop on the floor.

WAIT, DROP ON THE FLOOR!!!???

"What happened to my sleeping bag?" he thought. Sitting up, he rubbed his head and looked around in the dark.

"Wait, I'm back in my room!" he mused aloud, suddenly noticing his voice sounded a little, well, feminine.

He groped around. "Hmm, where is that light switch?"

Finally finding the light, he snapped on the switch and realized-
"Hey, this isn't my room! It's too - blue! Who-"
He broke off as he realized the only person who loved blue and water Pokemon was

"MISTY! Like, why are you awake at like, this time of night, little sis?"

Recoiling as he realized she was talking to him, Ash improvised.
"I uh...hit my head on the wall on my way to the bathroom."

"Like, okay, whatever you say, little sis," Daisy said.

She apparently was waiting for Ash/Misty to leave for the bathroom, so he hesitantly got up and adventured out the door and...
"Um, Daisy? Where's the bathroom again?"

"That bump must have like, given you, like, temporary amnesia! It's, like, down the hall to the left".

He walked to the bathroom, and looked in the mirror. Realizing he was really Misty, an evil grin spread across his face.

13132221.content:
Pikachu wakes up and tiredly, too tired to realise anything is wrong. Ash and Dawn had been travelling together around Sinnoh together since Brock left to look after his family. When he was fully awake he looked around and found something wrong. When they had gone to sleep last night Pikachu had been with Ash but now he was at the other end of the clearing.

Suddenly an arm rapped around him and pulled him close to a body. Twisting round he came to face to face with Dawn who was just waking up.

Dawn yawned and said. "Good morning Bunary." Making Pikachu confused.

Why was he with Dawn when he should be with Ash? And why did Dawn call him Bunary? As Dawn let go of him and got up to make breakfast he slowly walked over to Ash but stopped as he saw himself slowly crawl from Ash's sleeping bag.

Shocked he looked down at himself and saw he had brown fur on his chest and arms and that he had cream fur covering his waist area. 'Oh no!' He thought as his new brown paw slowly reached down through the cream fur towards his 'regions'. Instead of his usual sheath he felt something completely different and alien. Panicking he started feeling around trying in vain to find his lost pokehood but instead felt a strange pleasure that he should not have experienced.

With a start he realized he was no longer a he but a she! Panicking he looked around wondering what to do when he thought. 'Wait! If i'm Bunary then that would mean Bunary is me!'

She quickly ran over to her old body and exclaimed. "Bunary! What happened to us?"

What happens next?
13132221.title: Yes

choices: Traditional body swap w/ no memory or personality alterations.
Traditional body swap w/  slight memory or personality alterations.
132.content: Ash, is on his way home from Unova, with only Pikachu company. Currently, the two lifelong pals and the are taking a break, eating some roasted berries on a stick in a clearing located somewhere in Jhoto. "Hey, Pikachu. Remember all those good times we had here? Personally, I loved being in Altimar. I just can't figure out who kissed me though." Ash said. "Pika, Pi Pikachu Chu Pi. (Ash, that was Latias who kissed you. She obviously was in love with you.)" Pikachu said. Suddenly, a shadow passes over the clearing, circling around, and then astonishingly, there in the center of the clearing was Latias! Ash then ran over to check if she was alright. "Latias, are you alright?!" Ash says worringly. "La Latias Tias La Latias. (Yes I am alright Ash. I just wanted to see you again.)" Latias says with some minor muted pain. Ash then says, "I wish I could directly know how badly you're damaged." Both Ash and Latias then are knocked unconscious.
